message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $9,600 for it.
Thank you for offering the premium product. I understand its value, but considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $8,500.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. In light of this, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $9,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the market value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $8,800 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I value the opportunity to work with you. My counteroffer for the product is $8,900.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $8,750 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to come closer to your proposal. My counteroffer for the product is $8,850.
I appreciate your continued negotiation, Alice. After reviewing the situation, I would like to propose a price of $8,700 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I've considered your position and am willing to reach a compromise. My counteroffer for the product is $8,750.
I appreciate your effort in reaching a compromise, Alice. After thorough consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $8,650 for the product.
